headline.main: Murray Survives Seven Match Points in Dubai Quarterfinals
headline.print_headline: Murray Survives Seven Match Points in Dubai Quarterfinals

lead_paragraph: A federal judge on Thursday dismissed claims by the U.S. government that Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton fraudulently duped wealthy investors before taking office, giving the Republican a key victory two months ahead of his criminal trial that carries a possible prison sentence.
